Introduction

The objectives of this lab are to:

  • Illustrate how inheritance allows us to derive new classes from existing ones so that we may reuse code without altering (and breaking) existing code.
  • See how our code can work with with classes that haven't even been written yet thanks to the concept of polymorphism.

Your first step is to create a new project named project10 and in it a package called lab10. You can go ahead and download some sample code that will be needed later:

IntList.java
IntListSorted.java
SwingGraphicsExample.java
Portrait.java
GroupPhoto.java
